BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.SQLStatementContextFactory.getDALStatementContext(DALStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.decider.engine.SQLFederationDeciderEngine holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.decider.engine.SQLFederationDeciderEngine.deciders, but uses it as only a List
